org.opendaylight.controller.cluster.datastore.utils

Class ActorContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opendaylight.controller.cluster.datastore.utils.ActorContext
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MockActorContext

    public class ActorContext
extends java.lang.Object
    The ActorContext class contains utility methods which could be used by non-actors (like DistributedDataStore) to work with actors a little more easily. An ActorContext can be freely passed around to local object instances but should not be passed to actors especially remote actors
